post:
It is quite a while ago since we posted [our last LET offer](https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/84750/onvirt-6-eur-1-gb-ram-kvm-vps-ssd-raid10-intel-xeon-e5-germany "[OnVirt] 6 EUR • 1 GB RAM • KVM VPS • SSD RAID10 • Intel Xeon E5 • Germany"), so this is just a refresher :)  

<em>&nbsp;<em>
[![OnVirt - Prepaid VPS. High Performance. SSD Only.](https://onvirt.de/assets/OnVirt_724x58.png)](https://onvirt.de "OnVirt - Prepaid VPS. High Performance. SSD Only.")  
<em>&nbsp;<em>

OnVirt is committed to its outstanding VPS performance. To guarantee high VPS performance we are only using quality hardware, KVM virtualziation and do **not** oversubscribe our systems.  

We offer a **14-day full money back guarantee** to convince yourself.
We accept PayPal and SEPA Bank Transfer.  

Our high availability and Tier 3 (TIER III) certified datacenter is located in Frankfurt, Germany.
The datacenter is equipped with first class carrier connectivity and direct uplinks (each 10 Gbit/s) to Deutsche Telekom (DTAG), Telia Sonera, GTT, Voxility,  Hurricane Electric, DE-CiX / ECIX, KleyRex and 20 Gbit/s Core Backbone.

Anything you would like to ask us? [**Join our Telegram channel**](https://t.me/OnVirt "OnVirt - Telegram channel").

<em>&nbsp;<em>

> [**OnVirt • 512 MB RAM VPS**](https://onvirt.de "OnVirt  • 512 MB RAM VPS")
> -
> * 512MB RAM (dedicated, no overcommit)
> * 1 vCPU
> * 20GB SSD space (ZFS RAID10)
> * 500GB transfer
> * **Coupon: LET20**
> * **4 EUR/month**
> * 11.40 EUR/quarter (**5% additional discount**)  
> * 21.60 EUR/semi annual (**10% additional discount**)  

<em><em>

> [**OnVirt • 1 GB RAM VPS**](https://onvirt.de "OnVirt • 1 GB RAM VPS")
> -
> * 1GB RAM (dedicated, no overcommit)
> * 1 vCPU
> * 30GB SSD space (ZFS RAID10)
> * 2TB transfer
> * **Coupon: LET40** (This 40% discount coupon is also valid for our higher VPS models)
> * **6 EUR/month**
> * 17.10 EUR/quarter (**5% additional discount**)  
> * 32.40 EUR/semi annual (**10% additional discount**)  

<em>&nbsp;<em>

**Features**
-

Each VPS from OnVirt has the following features:

* 200Mbps uplink (500Mbps upgrade is available)
* 1x IPv4
* 1x IPv6
* KVM Virtualization
* Instant setup
* Operating Systems: Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora and CentOS
* **Indiviual .iso available upon [request](https://onvirt.de/customers/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2&subject=ISO%20Request "OnVirt Support")**

<em>&nbsp;<em>

**Technical**
-
Our VPS are running on the following **enterprise hardware**:

* Intel Xeon E5-1620 v3 @ 3.50 GHz CPU
* DDR4 ECC RAM
* Enterprise-level SSD (ZFS RAID10)
* SuperMicro Rackserver

Check out our **Looking Glass** at [https://lg.onvirt.de](https://lg.onvirt.de "OnVirt Looking Glass"):  

* Test IPv4: 5.1.75.5  
* Test IPv6: 2a00:f820:50::13:5  

<em>&nbsp;<em>

We have been featured twice on LowEndBox. You may check the comments there, too.  
[LEB: OnVirt](https://lowendbox.com/tag/onvirt-io/ "LowEndBox: OnVirt")  

<em>&nbsp;<em>

We are looking forward to your feedback and comments :-)

Best Regards  
Sebastian from [OnVirt](https://onvirt.de/ "OnVirt - Prepaid VPS. High Performance. SSD Only.")
